insider-relationship-vocab
==========================

**Acquaintance** (1)

    Persons known to each other but not otherwise close

**Colleague** (2)

    Working together on the same team, department, or organization

**Former Colleague** (3)

    Formerly worked together on the same team, department, or organization

**Friend** (4)

    An ongoing close and/or friendly relationship

**Relative** (5)

    Members of the same family (immediate or extended)

**Significant Other/Legal partner** (6)

    Spouse, boyfriend, girlfriend, common law partner, or similar

**Unknown** (8)

    The type of relationship is unknown

**Other** (9)

    The type of relationship is known, but not listed in this vocabulary
